title: Ep. 83: Are You a Hedgehog or a Fox?
description:
Why reading three off-beat magazines can boost your happiness, the challenge of going freelance, and the question: Are you a hedgehog or a fox? Get in touch: @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin.com; happiercast.com/83; 774-277-9336. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
